sentences.en: As a separate science of law, health jurisprudence should have its own theoretical system.
sentences.cn: 作为独立的法学学科，卫生法学应形成公认的理论体系。

sentences.en: Bob is best remembered for his work in economics, jurisprudence and political science .
sentences.cn: 鲍勃以其在经济学、法学和政治学领域的成就而为人们所牢记。

sentences.en: Bodin is best remembered for his work in economics, jurisprudence and political science.
sentences.cn: 博丹以其在经济学 、 法学和政治学领域的成就而为人们所牢记.

sentences.en: Different thinkers in different times give different answers about what is jurisprudence.
sentences.cn: “什么是法哲学”?处于不同历史时期的思想家给予了不同的答案.

sentences.en: Going up in academic, reality, jurisprudence and administrative system is feasible.
sentences.cn: 在理论 、 现实 、 法律体系及治理体制上都是可行的.

sentences.en: Hobbes is a precursor of modern positivism and analytical jurisprudence.
sentences.cn: 霍布斯是现代实证主义法学和分析法学的先驱.

sentences.en: In 2004, we have gained quite great progress to Chinese constitutional jurisprudence.
sentences.cn: 2004年我国宪法学研究取得了长足的进展.

sentences.en: In jurisprudence it is a well-known principle that justice should not merely be done but should also be seen to be done.
sentences.cn: 在法理学方面，人所共知的原则是：对受害者不仅应该公正对待，而且应当让人们看到他得到了公正的对待。

sentences.en: In jurisprudence, science, and the arts, man has revealed the boundless magnitude of his mind.
sentences.cn: 在法学 、 科学和人文学科方面, 人类显示出来的智慧也是博大无边的.

sentences.en: Is there an attempt on such square medical jurisprudence?
sentences.cn: 这样的方法医学上有尝试 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is an interdisciplinary subject between jurisprudence and economics.
sentences.cn: 它是法学和经济学科际整合的边缘学科.

sentences.en: Neither of these two authors, however , questions the legitimacy of other approaches to jurisprudence.
sentences.cn: 这两位著作者对于法理学其它方法的合理性都未曾提出质疑.

sentences.en: Science of financial constitution is an interdisciplinary subject of economics and jurisprudence.
sentences.cn: 财政宪法是经济学与法学交叉的研究领域.

sentences.en: Such a view has been stigmatized as mechanical jurisprudence.
sentences.cn: 蔑称这种观点为机械法学.

sentences.en: There exists argument between jurisprudence and legal philosophy in academic circles.
sentences.cn: 理论学界存在着法理学与法哲学的争辩.

sentences.en: There is natural relationship between philosophy and jurisprudence.
sentences.cn: 摘要法学与哲学之间存在着天然的亲缘关系.
